thread.title: Isabella Crane
thread.title_full: Kayla Itsines Bikini Body Guide Workout Discount Site reviewed by Isabella Crane

author: Isabella Crane
title: Isabella Crane
text:
I honestly didn't believe that the BBG, BBG 2, and the nutrition guide were only $40 (such a HUGE discount). My friend In California had bragged on this program and told me how it helped her lose weight before her wedding and she shares this link with me. I received my ebooks and guide within seconds of hitting the "submit payment" button and will start my journey to becoming bikini body ready. Thank you SO much, Kayla, for offering such a wonderful discount option to us!
Xoxo - Isabella
